sect1.title: GUI options
sect1.para: These options control the look and feel of darktable.
sect1.bridgehead: width of the side panels in pixels
sect1.para: This controls the size of side panels in pixels. Side panels are found left and right to the center view (default 300).
sect1.bridgehead: don't use embedded preview jpeg but half-size raw
sect1.para: Check this option to not use the embedded jpeg from the raw file but process the raw data. This is slower but gives you color managed thumbnails (default off).
sect1.bridgehead: ask before removing images from database
sect1.para: Always ask the user before any image is removed from the database (default on).
sect1.bridgehead: ask before erasing images from disk
sect1.para: Always ask the user before any image file is deleted (default on).
sect1.bridgehead: ask before moving images from film roll folder
sect1.para: Always ask the user before any image file is moved (default on).
sect1.bridgehead: ask before copying images to new film roll folder
sect1.para: Always ask the user before any image file is copied (default on).
sect1.bridgehead: number of folder levels to show in lists
sect1.para: The number of folder levels to show in film roll names, starting from the right (default 1).
sect1.bridgehead: ignore jpeg images when importing film rolls
sect1.para: When having RAW+JPEG images together in one directory it makes no sense to import both. With this flag one can ignore all jpegs found (default off).
sect1.bridgehead: recursive directory traversal when importing film rolls
sect1.para: Not only import images from the directory selected but recursively go through all subdirectories as well (default off).
sect1.bridgehead: creator to be applied when importing
sect1.para: If provided, automatically add this string as a creator tag when importing images (default none).
sect1.bridgehead: publisher to be applied when importing
sect1.para: If provided, automatically add this string as a publisher tag when importing images (default none).
sect1.bridgehead: rights to be applied when importing
sect1.para: If provided, automatically add this string as a copyrights tag when importing images (default none).
sect1.bridgehead: comma separated tags to be applied when importing
sect1.para: If you want to add further tags when importing images, you can give them as a comma separated list (default none).
sect1.bridgehead: initial import rating
sect1.para: Initial star rating (from 0 to 5) for all images when importing a film roll (default 1).
sect1.bridgehead: enable filmstrip
sect1.para: Enable the filmstrip in darkroom, tethering and geomapping modes (default on).
sect1.bridgehead: maximum width of image drawing area
sect1.para: Maximum width of the image drawing area in darkroom mode - adjust to your screen. Needs a restart and will invalidate current thumbnail caches (default 1300).
sect1.bridgehead: maximum height of image drawing area
sect1.para: Maximum height of the image drawing area in darkroom mode - adjust to your screen. Needs a restart and will invalidate current thumbnail caches (default 1000).
sect1.bridgehead: compression of thumbnail images
pen pressure control for brush masks
sect1.para: Controls how the pressure reading of a graphics tablet impacts newly generated brush strokes (see ). You can control the brush width, its hardness and its opacity. Absolute control means that the pressure reading directly defines the attribute with a value between 0% and 100%. Relative means that the pressure reading adjusts the attribute between zero and the pre-defined default value (default off).
sect1.bridgehead: ask before deleting a tag
sect1.para: Always ask user before deleting a tag from an image (default on).
sect1.bridgehead: maximum number of images drawn on map
sect1.para: The maximum number of geotagged images drawn on the map. Increasing this number can slow down the drawing of the map. Needs a restart if changed (default 100).
sect1.bridgehead: pretty print the image location
sect1.para: Show a more readable representation of the geo location in the image information module (default on).
sect1.bridgehead: expand a single lighttable module at a time
sect1.para: Controls how lighttable panels are expanded. If this option is enabled, expanding a panel by clicking collapses any currently expanded panel. If you want to expand a panel without collapsing the others you do so with shift+click. Disabling this option reverts the meaning of click and shift+click (default off).
sect1.bridgehead: expand a single darkroom module at a time
sect1.para: Controls how darkroom modules are expanded. If this option is enabled, expanding a module by clicking collapses any currently expanded module. If you want to expand a module without collapsing the others you do so with shift+click. Disabling this option reverts the meaning of click and shift+click (default on).
sect1.bridgehead: method to use for getting the display profile
sect1.para: This option allows to force a specific means of getting the current display profile in the output color profile module (see ). In the default setting all darktable will either query the X display server's xatom or the colord system service. You can set this option to xatom or colord to enforce a specific method if the alternative gives wrong results.
